lemma sas_plus_equivalent_to_strips_i_a_VII: assumes "is_valid_problem_sas_plus \<Psi>" and "dom s \<subseteq> set ((\<Psi>)\<^sub>\<V>\<^sub>+)" and "\<forall>v \<in> dom s. the (s v) \<in> \<R>\<^sub>+ \<Psi> v" and "set ops' \<subseteq> set ((\<phi> \<Psi>)\<^sub>\<O>)" and "are_all_operators_applicable_in s [\<phi>\<^sub>O\<inverse> \<Psi> op'. op' \<leftarrow> ops'] \<and> are_all_operator_effects_consistent [\<phi>\<^sub>O\<inverse> \<Psi> op'. op' \<leftarrow> ops']" shows "STRIPS_Semantics.are_all_operator_effects_consistent ops'"
